title: Should Brazil ban Huawei and take the $1 billion offered by the USA? - Quora

response.answer_text: yes, the offer seems very lucrative - but there is just one problem. This is only a pledge and an American pledge is like farting with your mouth. If I was brazil I would say - show me the moolah first - put the money in my bank account first. one billion is a good offer - if only USA could give all the countries who would want to buy other networks
